pkgmetadata.longdescription: Visualizing Multilevel Data // Provides two functions: Group_function() and Parallel_Tree(). Group_function() applies a given function (e.g.,mean()) to input variable(s) by group across levels. Has additional data management options. Parallel_Tree() uses 'ggplot2' to create a parallel coordinate plots (technically a facsimile of parallel coordinate plots in a Cartesian coordinate system). Used in combination these functions can create parallel tree plots, a variant of parallel coordinate plots, which are useful for visualizing multilevel data.
